name: Animal Planet:Evolution
description:
From the primitive era to modern civilization, this is a casual game that spans multiple civilizations!
Develop a mammoth, dinosaur and many other animals. On this blue planet, create your own civilization!
Game features:
Free download, fun synthesis
Idle game, easy to play
Feel the civilization, cross the era
Planet evolution, the rise of civilization

You can download to experience game and compete with your players around the world to compete for your civilization!

Order Pricing and Terms
Sub Option
In our game, we have the following subscription options:
Gold Members offer subscriptions of $4.49 per week after 3 days of free trial.
1. Unlocking 150% revenue acceleration;
2. Adding two additional tracks;
3. 120% offline income;
4. Get 10 diamonds a day.
5. Remove all ADs.
End of probation and Subscription Renewal
This price is set for USA customers. Pricing in other countries/regions may vary, and the actual cost may be converted to your local currency depending on the country/region of residence.
Payment will be deducted from your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase.
Subscriptions are automatically renewed unless automatic renewal is closed at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
The account will charge a renewal fee within 24 hours before the end of the current period and determine the renewal fee.
Subscriptions can be managed by users, and automatic renewal can be turned off by transferring to the user's account settings after purchase.
Any unused part of the free trial period (if provided) will be confiscated when the subscription to the publication is purchased by the user (if applicable).
Cancellation of probation or subscription
You can close the automatic Subscription Renewal at any time in the iTunes account settings. Visit https://support.apple.com/HT202039.
When your current trial/subscription deadline expires, you will be unsubscribed. Cannot cancel the current valid subscription period. When the subscription expires, you will no longer be able to use the elements provided in the selected subscription options.
If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to contact us at 279328010@qq.com.
